Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)

sentences.english: We learn compassion from Guan Yin Bodhisattva and single-minded concentration from Great Strength Bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 學觀世音菩薩的慈悲，學大勢至菩薩的專一。

sentences.english: there stands a statue of Kuan Im,the Goddess of Mercy.
sentences.chinese: 矗立着觀世音菩薩的塑像。

sentences.english: This is the famous Golden Jade Guanyin.
sentences.chinese: 這就是有名的金玉觀世音。

sentences.english: Guan Yin Bodhisattva is the twenty-seventh advisor whom Sudhana has learned from.
sentences.chinese: 善財童子參訪的第二十七參就是觀世音菩薩。

sentences.english: They become the two helpers of Guan Yin's rescuing living beings upon hearing their suffering.
sentences.chinese: 他們也是觀世音“聞聲救苦”的左右助手。

sentences.english: It is said Mazu was a Longnv (dragon maid) along with the Guanyin.
sentences.chinese: 傳說媽祖原是觀世音身邊的一個龍女。

sentences.english: Just think of your root guru and Avalokiteshvara.
sentences.chinese: 只要牢牢地想着你的上師與觀世音菩薩。

sentences.english: Why is Amitabha sitting above Guan Yin Bodhisattva?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼觀世音菩薩頭頂坐的是阿彌陀佛？
